thread.title: SHOCK CLAIMS: Trump supporter invited on stage was 'PLANTED in the crowd by PRESIDENT'
thread.title_full: SHOCK CLAIMS: Trump supporter invited on stage was 'PLANTED in the crowd by PRESIDENT'

title: SHOCK CLAIMS: Trump supporter invited on stage was 'PLANTED in the crowd by PRESIDENT'
text:
FACEBOOK Gene Huber posted that Trump was calling him on his Facebook page 
Yet social media users were quick to claim Trump inviting Mr Huber on stage was a carefully orchestrated ploy. 
CNN’s Jacki Schechner claimed Mr Huber was planted in the crowd. 
She tweeted: “No way Secret Service would have let Gene Huber on stage w/o his being vetted. Huber just said he salutes a box of paraphernalia every day.” Gene Huber was staged. Def not a random. Here's his FB page: https://t.co/7GG6OGMiYG Posted from Trump Winery two days ago. pic.twitter.com/SqIQWTMFAz 
Ms Schechner added: “Gene Huber was staged. Def not a random. Here's his FB page… Posted from Trump Winery two days ago.” 
Mr Huber also posted a picture on his Facebook claiming that the President had called him. 
He greeted the former business tycoon with a huge after being told by the Republican to jump the barrier and address the crowd. Inside Trump's White House Chaos Thu, February 16, 2017
